segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the faucet is running, and the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the front edge, forming a steadily widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite shocking how she remains entirely unaware of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually standing right in the growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit disgusted by the sheer waste of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation seems like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Surely she must feel the water soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by her absolute focus on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me fearful of someone slipping and hurting themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen will certainly suffer some water damage if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR
